channel.title: Do Not See "Dreamgirls"
channel.description:
Holy fucking shit. This movie should have been called NightmareHo's. As if I don't see enough skinny black bitches with strange haircuts on the way to work every morning, trying to make me buy sex from them, now I have to see a bunch of skinny black bitches with strange haircuts in a national advertising campaign to make me buy movie tickets from them. No thanks Paramount Pictures, I'd rather dip my testicles in an active volcano than sit through two hours of shitty actors trying to sing music that was new and exciting fifty years ago. That's another thing that grinds my proverbial gears. When the fuck did every actor become a musician by default? Paris Hilton, Hillary Duff, and even that skanky little redhead whatshername have released their own CDs. Is [b]not[/b] making a complete ass of yourself so difficult? Why can't they let out their alienation and rage at being loved and adored by the mindless-masses-of-brainwashed-american-capitalist-whores like normal human beings, and just slit their wrists and die? It's alot easier and less expensive than producing an angst ridden CD that actually turns out to be about getting drunk and having sex with somebody you just met.
"African-Americans, gays and upscale whites"
Unless you fit into all three of these categories at once, I predict you will not like dreamgirls.

item.title: Do Not See "Dreamgirls"
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“curse63, post:17, topic:39393”]LOok man,if you don’t like it that doesn’t mean other people won’t.Everyone has a different point of view on almost everything.In example: One person could find it hot in one place,and another finding it mild-cold for them at the same palce at the same time.So-they have different perspectives-you do too.You hate the movie,some people like the movie.

So shut up and keep your mouth shut and stop flaming.Some people might like it-they will flame you.Then you flame back…flame…flame…flame.Its gona turn this thread into a flaming war.

Mods,admins,lock this ASAP.

( I personally never saw the movie ).[/quote]

You are rediculously retarded. This thread was way out of place until you bumped it back to the first page, and now a flame war will probably begin just because of you.

Read full topic

item.title: Do Not See "Dreamgirls"
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Whoah, whoah. I love black people. Call me nigger lover and stick a dead nigger in my garage goddamnit.

I just think this is some serious exploitation going on here, not of the predictably dimwitted American audience, but of the actors in the film. Jesus Christ, did they know they were starring in one of the signs of the coming apocalypse?
